remarks: The set of variables in an expression is a finite subset of ` V ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mvrsval.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
mvrsval.e $e |- E = ( mEx ` T ) $.
mvrsval.w $e |- W = ( mVars ` T ) $.
mvrsfpw $p |- ( X e. E -> ( W ` X ) e. ( ~P V i^i Fin ) ) $.
